sn48.24:4.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, samādhi, and wisdom.
sn48.24:4.6: Someone who has completed and fulfilled these five faculties is a perfected one. If they are weaker than that, they’re one who is extinguished in-between one life and the next … one who is extinguished upon landing … one who is extinguished without extra effort … one who is extinguished with extra effort … one who heads upstream, going to the Akaniṭṭha realm … a once-returner … a one-seeder … one who goes family to family … one who has seven rebirths at most … a follower of principle … a follower by faith.”
